nodes.text: Vemu was the location where Oeklass went after stealing a boat on Mistar-5. Vemu was located in Abar-12.

Vemu was mentioned in Monsters and Aliens from George Lucas, a book published in 1993. Lucasfilm employee Leland Chee, who maintains the Holocron continuity database, has indicated that information contained in the book is non-canonical.
